name: The Myth Of Awakening
description:
Discarded... Disregarded... Discontinued...

You are awake knowing one thing; to achieve “activation” within you.

Play as the experimental entity, WONDER as you discover the ruins of apocalyptic research lab you are placed in.

Explore, Discover.
Don’t let your energy run out while doing so.
Make sure to check the system often.

Collect, Sustain.
“SEED OF LIFE” will aid your body to sustain.
“DT Cartridge” will help you grow out of each phase.

“Activate”.
The fate of the humanity is in your very being.
Find a way to get out of the loop.

At last, the fate is upon you...
